synopsis.text:
Puka, Puca, and Prim, oh my! A world of mystery unfolds as Sora, Mashiro, Tsubasa, and Ageha awaken to find themselves separated from their friends and thrust into a realm where only Pretty Cure exists. In this strange land, memories are hazy, and new alliances are formed as they encounter fellow Pretty Cures from across 20 different series.

Sora teams up with Yui, Manatsu, and the powerful Cure Supreme, while Mashiro joins forces with Laura, Amane, and Nodoka to rescue Puca from a monstrous attack. Tsubasa explores a hanging garden with Saaya, Ha-chan, and Haruka, and Ageha attempts to mediate between Asumi, Lala, and Yukari, who can't seem to get along.

With the only clue to returning home being a distant castle, these 77 Pretty Cures embark on a grand adventure to find answers and restore their memories. Will they discover the truth behind this mysterious world and find their way back to their own reality? Join them on their epic journey in this celebratory 20th-anniversary movie of the Precure franchise!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
